channel.title: Livestream Design
channel.description:
I need some images for my new Livestream site. I'm going to be streaming films, and I need something that pertains to films. But it needs to be comical. The title of the steam is called AnonTron. I would love to have an entire theme behind the site, and the videos in between the films. Mostly of classic television, Transformers, G.I. Joe, etc. Anything from the '70's, 80's, and 90's really.
As for the color palette, I was hoping for something along the lines of: http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/878370/Moria
Maybe a monotone of the classic Optimus Prime, Cobra Commander, Thunderbirds, etc. All of them standing in a group in action poses.
I also need a logo, of just the two Letters, but something creative, like the original Playstation logo.
If you can do all of this, I will give you a position on the staff.

item.title: Livestream Design
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Nah after I thought about it, this would have been better in the graphics section, since I’m in need of graphics. But you can’t delete your own topics here. I’m actually just going to make them myself, I just don’t feel like installing Photoshop.

Read full topic

item.title: Livestream Design
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Small chance anyone will design & code a complete website for you, just to get administrator position. Very low, I suggest you use a blog and add widgets to it, maybe that will help =/.

Read full topic
